definition: suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: Bayern Munchen is looking for a defensive wing.
sentences.chinese: 拜仁在尋找一個邊路防守球員。

sentences.english: He can play centre-back or either full-back.
sentences.chinese: 他可以打中後衛和任何一個位置的邊路後衛。

sentences.english: He plays as a midfield play-maker but can also play on the wing.
sentences.chinese: 他可以當中場組織者也可以踢邊路。

sentences.english: The different roles of wide players in Chelsea's 4-3-3.
sentences.chinese: 在切爾西的433陣型中，邊路球員扮演過不同角色。

sentences.english: An extra half-hour was spent with the Frenchman volleying crosses from either side.
sentences.chinese: 他又進行了半小時的邊路傳中之後凌空射門的訓練。

sentences.english: Bayer Leverkusen winger Arturo Vidal is being tracked by AC Milan.
sentences.chinese: 米蘭追逐勒沃庫森邊路球員比達爾。

sentences.english: My mate Cally is up there with the best wingers I've ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 我的哥們兒卡利是我曾見過的最棒的邊路球員。

sentences.english: This decade has seen Portugal produce a never-ending assembly line of top-class wingers.
sentences.chinese: 過去的十年間，葡萄牙湧現了一批世界級的邊路球員。

sentences.english: He plays in the middle, he plays out wide, he plays up front.
sentences.chinese: 他現在打中路或者邊路，還能打前鋒。

sentences.english: Rudi Garcia's attack-minded Lille side share his philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 魯迪加西亞的邊路進攻哲學對里爾十分有用。

sentences.english: But it's the winger we'll remember him as.
sentences.chinese: 不過我們的記憶中，他依舊是那個在邊路飛翔的天使。
